players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "I'm inclined to believe Charlie's claim about Bob. We should vote him out to protect the town."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana; my investigation confirms Bob is the mafioso. Let's vote him out now to end this threat."
Diana: "I still believe Charlie's investigation. Let's vote for Bob to protect the town."
